channel.title: Show-Offs on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Show-Offs on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Russia Tests Hypersonic Missile at NATO’s Doorstep—and Shares the Video
item.description: Russian military exercises near NATO borders follow the recent incursion of Russian drones into the airspace of Poland and Romania, further stoking tensions with the West.
